description:
Take GitHub to the command line

GitHub CLI (gh) is a command-line tool that brings pull requests, issues, GitHub Actions, and other GitHub features to your terminal, so you can do all your work in one place.
This is a small patch release to fix installing gh via go install which was broken with v2.60.0.

What's Changed
- Update testscript to use hard fork by @williammartin in #9821

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cli/cli/compare/v2.60.0...v2.60.1
